bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
bulbasaur.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
ivysaur.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

venusaur.name: Venusaur
venusaur.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

charmander.name: Charmander
charmander.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
charmeleon.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

charizard.name: Charizard
charizard.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

squirtle.name: Squirtle
squirtle.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

wartortle.name: Wartortle
wartortle.description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

blastoise.name: Blastoise
blastoise.description: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

caterpie.name: Caterpie
caterpie.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

metapod.name: Metapod
metapod.description: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

butterfree.name: Butterfree
butterfree.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

weedle.name: Weedle
weedle.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

kakuna.name: Kakuna
kakuna.description: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

beedrill.name: Beedrill
beedrill.description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pidgey.name: Pidgey
pidgey.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

pidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
pidgeotto.description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

pidgeot.name: Pidgeot
pidgeot.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

rattata.name: Rattata
rattata.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

raticate.name: Raticate
raticate.description: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

spearow.name: Spearow
spearow.description: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

fearow.name: Fearow
fearow.description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

ekans.name: Ekans
ekans.description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

arbok.name: Arbok
arbok.description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.description: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

raichu.name: Raichu
raichu.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

sandshrew.name: Sandshrew
sandshrew.description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

sandslash.name: Sandslash
sandslash.description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

nidoran-f.name: Nidoran-f
nidoran-f.description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

nidorina.name: Nidorina
nidorina.description: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

nidoqueen.name: Nidoqueen
nidoqueen.description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

nidoran-m.name: Nidoran-m
nidoran-m.description: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

nidorino.name: Nidorino
nidorino.description: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

nidoking.name: Nidoking
nidoking.description: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

clefairy.name: Clefairy
clefairy.description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

clefable.name: Clefable
clefable.description: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

vulpix.name: Vulpix
vulpix.description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

ninetales.name: Ninetales
ninetales.description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
jigglypuff.description: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

wigglytuff.name: Wigglytuff
wigglytuff.description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

zubat.name: Zubat
zubat.description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

golbat.name: Golbat
golbat.description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

oddish.name: Oddish
oddish.description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

gloom.name: Gloom
gloom.description: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

vileplume.name: Vileplume
vileplume.description: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

paras.name: Paras
paras.description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

parasect.name: Parasect
parasect.description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

venonat.name: Venonat
venonat.description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

venomoth.name: Venomoth
venomoth.description: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

diglett.name: Diglett
diglett.description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
dugtrio.description: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

meowth.name: Meowth
meowth.description: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.

persian.name: Persian
persian.description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

psyduck.name: Psyduck
psyduck.description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

golduck.name: Golduck
golduck.description: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

mankey.name: Mankey
mankey.description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

primeape.name: Primeape
primeape.description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

growlithe.name: Growlithe
growlithe.description: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

arcanine.name: Arcanine
arcanine.description: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

poliwag.name: Poliwag
poliwag.description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

poliwhirl.name: Poliwhirl
poliwhirl.description: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

poliwrath.name: Poliwrath
poliwrath.description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

abra.name: Abra
abra.description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

kadabra.name: Kadabra
kadabra.description: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

alakazam.name: Alakazam
alakazam.description: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

machop.name: Machop
machop.description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

machoke.name: Machoke
machoke.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

machamp.name: Machamp
machamp.description: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
bellsprout.description: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

weepinbell.name: Weepinbell
weepinbell.description: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

victreebel.name: Victreebel
victreebel.description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

tentacool.name: Tentacool
tentacool.description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

tentacruel.name: Tentacruel
tentacruel.description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

geodude.name: Geodude
geodude.description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

graveler.name: Graveler
graveler.description: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

golem.name: Golem
golem.description: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

ponyta.name: Ponyta
ponyta.description: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

rapidash.name: Rapidash
rapidash.description: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

slowpoke.name: Slowpoke
slowpoke.description: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

slowbro.name: Slowbro
slowbro.description: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

magnemite.name: Magnemite
magnemite.description: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

magneton.name: Magneton
magneton.description: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

farfetchd.name: Farfetchd
farfetchd.description: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

doduo.name: Doduo
doduo.description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

dodrio.name: Dodrio
dodrio.description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

seel.name: Seel
seel.description: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

dewgong.name: Dewgong
dewgong.description: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

grimer.name: Grimer
grimer.description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

muk.name: Muk
muk.description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

shellder.name: Shellder
shellder.description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

cloyster.name: Cloyster
cloyster.description: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

gastly.name: Gastly
gastly.description: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

haunter.name: Haunter
haunter.description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

gengar.name: Gengar
gengar.description: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

onix.name: Onix
onix.description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

drowzee.name: Drowzee
drowzee.description: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

hypno.name: Hypno
hypno.description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

krabby.name: Krabby
krabby.description: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

kingler.name: Kingler
kingler.description: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

voltorb.name: Voltorb
voltorb.description: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

electrode.name: Electrode
electrode.description: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

exeggcute.name: Exeggcute
exeggcute.description: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
exeggutor.description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

cubone.name: Cubone
cubone.description: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.

marowak.name: Marowak
marowak.description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
hitmonlee.description: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
hitmonchan.description: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

lickitung.name: Lickitung
lickitung.description: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

koffing.name: Koffing
koffing.description: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

weezing.name: Weezing
weezing.description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

rhyhorn.name: Rhyhorn
rhyhorn.description: A POKéMON with a one-track mind. Once it charges,  it won't stop running until it falls asleep.

rhydon.name: Rhydon
rhydon.description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

chansey.name: Chansey
chansey.description: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

tangela.name: Tangela
tangela.description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.

kangaskhan.name: Kangaskhan
kangaskhan.description: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

horsea.name: Horsea
horsea.description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

seadra.name: Seadra
seadra.description: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

goldeen.name: Goldeen
goldeen.description: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

seaking.name: Seaking
seaking.description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

staryu.name: Staryu
staryu.description: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.

starmie.name: Starmie
starmie.description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

mr-mime.name: Mr-mime
mr-mime.description: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

scyther.name: Scyther
scyther.description: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

jynx.name: Jynx
jynx.description: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
electabuzz.description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

magmar.name: Magmar
magmar.description: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

pinsir.name: Pinsir
pinsir.description: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

tauros.name: Tauros
tauros.description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

magikarp.name: Magikarp
magikarp.description: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

gyarados.name: Gyarados
gyarados.description: Once it begins to rampage, a GYARADOS will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

lapras.name: Lapras
lapras.description: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

ditto.name: Ditto
ditto.description: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

eevee.name: Eevee
eevee.description: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

vaporeon.name: Vaporeon
vaporeon.description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

jolteon.name: Jolteon
jolteon.description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

flareon.name: Flareon
flareon.description: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

porygon.name: Porygon
porygon.description: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

omanyte.name: Omanyte
omanyte.description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

omastar.name: Omastar
omastar.description: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

kabuto.name: Kabuto
kabuto.description: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

kabutops.name: Kabutops
kabutops.description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

aerodactyl.name: Aerodactyl
aerodactyl.description: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

snorlax.name: Snorlax
snorlax.description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

articuno.name: Articuno
articuno.description: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

zapdos.name: Zapdos
zapdos.description: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

moltres.name: Moltres
moltres.description: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

dratini.name: Dratini
dratini.description: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

dragonair.name: Dragonair
dragonair.description: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

dragonite.name: Dragonite
dragonite.description: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

mewtwo.name: Mewtwo
mewtwo.description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

mew.name: Mew
mew.description: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
